title: 3 easy steps to achieving your perfect GD!
body:
Step 1: Stop circlejerking!
Step 2: Tell everyone you stopped circlejerking and how happy it makes you!
Step 3: Bother everyone else to stop circlejerking and bring up circlejerks in every post you make!

If you're not convinced already, listen to these satisfied customers!

"Wow, it really worked!" ~Double D
"My boyfriend and I started doing this and our GD experience is now the best it's ever been!" ~Anonymous steel-type trainer
"Gut the Freelo Explorer" ~Ezreal Wright
